what_you_do: Randy Peyser is the Founder of Author One Stop, Inc. She is a master at writing book proposals and pitching books.
who_you_serve: Randy has over 20 years of solid connections with the literary agents and publishers she pitches.
social_proof: Randy has delivered over 500 talks and keynotes on "How to Get a Book Deal with a Publisher" for conferences, virtual summits, webinars, radio and TV shows, and podcasts. Further, she is a revered faculty member for CEO Space International, which Forbes has called, "the number one must-attend forum in the world."
signature_programs: Randy is the author of Crappy to Happy: Small Steps to Big Happiness NOW!, The Power of Miracle Thinking, and the Write-A-Book Program.
business_focus: Randy Peyser is the Founder of Author One Stop, Inc. and is a master at writing book proposals and pitching books.
service_provided: book proposal writing, book pitching, author coaching
